menu.title: Fitness Menu
menu.descr: The Fitness menu is a new approach to cooking: more fresh vegetables and fruits. Product of active and healthy people. This is a brand new product with the best price and high quality!

menu.title: Lean Menu
menu.descr: The Lean menu is a careful selection of ingredients: the complete absence of animal products, almond,oat, coconut or buckwheat milk, the right amount of protein due to tofu and imported vegetarian steaks.

menu.title: Keto Menu
menu.descr: Our ketogenic diet, meals and snacks are centered around the following foods: eggs, poultry, fish, meat, nuts, healthy fats, avocados, non-starchy vegetables, condiments
